relevant_findings.neck: supple with full range of motion, no lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.heart: regular rate and rhythm, normal heart sounds
relevant_findings.extremities: warm and well perfused, no edema
relevant_findings.neurologic: cranial nerves, motor strength, sensation, and gait normal

relevant_findings.rash: faint pink, morbilli-form rash on the trunk, sparing arms and legs

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The rash appeared two days after initial examination and corresponded with fever and headache, indicating a potential progression of the illness.
